paw_structure.scntl¶

Read control input file for structure_fast.

Main routine is scntl_read().

Dependencies:

os utility

scntl_read(root)

Read and interpret the control file <root>.scntl.

scntl_read_hbonds(text, idx)

Interpret the control block for hbonds.

scntl_read_ion(text, idx)

Interpret the control block for ion.

scntl_read_radial(text, idx)

Interpret the control block for radial.

scntl_read_scntl(text, idx, delete)

Interpret the control block for general information.

scntl_read_tra(text, idx)

Interpret the control block for tra.

scntl_read_water(text, idx)

Interpret the control block for water.

scntl_text(root[, ext])

Read text from root.scntl file and identify different control blocks.
paw_structure.scntl.scntl_read(root)¶

Read and interpret the control file <root>.scntl.

Parameters

root (str) – root name for the control file

Returns

dictionary of all dictionaries obtained from all the control blocks

Return type

dict[dict]

Note

Error checking with !TRA and !RADIAL does not work properly.

paw_structure.scntl.scntl_read_hbonds(text, idx)¶

Interpret the control block for hbonds.

Parameters

  • text (list[list[str]]) – text from the control file; each line is a list of words within the outer list

  • idx (list[int]) – list with two indices marking beginning and end of control block

Returns

dictionary containing all information obtained from the control block

Return type

dict

paw_structure.scntl.scntl_read_ion(text, idx)¶

Interpret the control block for ion.

Parameters

  • text (list[list[str]]) – text from the control file; each line is a list of words within the outer list

  • idx (list[int]) – list with two indices marking beginning and end of control block

Returns

dictionary containing all information obtained from the control block

Return type

dict

paw_structure.scntl.scntl_read_radial(text, idx)¶

Interpret the control block for radial.

Parameters

  • text (list[list[str]]) – text from the control file; each line is a list of words within the outer list

  • idx (list[int]) – list with two indices marking beginning and end of control block

Returns

dictionary containing all information obtained from the control block

Return type

dict

Note

Implement name identification for central atoms.

Interpret the control block for general information.

Parameters

  • idx (list[int]) – list with two indices marking beginning and end of control block

paw_structure.scntl.scntl_text(root, ext='.scntl')¶

Read text from root.scntl file and identify different control blocks.

XXX REFERENCE TO CONTROL FILE STRUCTURE XXX

Parameters

  • root (str) – root name for the control file

  • ext (str, optional) – Default “.scntl”. DO NOT USE!

Returns

text from the control file; each line is a list of words within the outer list dict: dictionary with control blocks and their position within the text

Return type

list[list[str]]

Note

Remove forced line structure (flatten text and search for key words).

Implement variable extension.
